mapper.select: select * from mt_goods t where (t.STORE_ID = #{storeId} or t.STORE_ID = 0) and t.STATUS = 'A' order by t.sort asc
select * from mt_goods o where o.STORE_ID = #{storeId} and o.STATUS = 'A' and o.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from mt_goods o where o.GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} and o.STATUS = 'A'
